sumireko:StrikeSeal.NAME: Striking Seal
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage.

sumireko:OccultSeal.NAME: Occult Seal
sumireko:OccultSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Occult. NL sumireko:Seal: Increases the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!.

sumireko:PsychokineticBurst.NAME: Psychokinetic Burst
sumireko:PsychokineticBurst.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards.
sumireko:Locked. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards.

sumireko:NaturalJinx.NAME: Natural Jinx
sumireko:NaturalJinx.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play an sumireko:Occult card, the enemy loses !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play an sumireko:Occult card, the enemy loses !M! HP.

sumireko:EchoSeal.NAME: Echo Seal
sumireko:EchoSeal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage.

sumireko:Simplicity.NAME: Simplicity
sumireko:Simplicity.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every 6 unupgraded cards in your deck. NL sumireko:Final.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL (Gain [E] for every 6 unupgraded cards in your deck.) NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:Cage.NAME: Cage
sumireko:Cage.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:Rite.NAME: Rite
sumireko:Rite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each active sumireko:Seal. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:Crush.NAME: Crush
sumireko:Crush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:Fling.NAME: Fling
sumireko:Fling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:Sever.NAME: Sever
sumireko:Sever.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's missing health, up to !M!. NL sumireko:Final.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's missing health, up to !M!. NL (Deals !D! damage.) NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:EscapeArtist.NAME: Escape Artist
sumireko:EscapeArtist.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL If you cannot play it, make it sumireko:Occult.

sumireko:CardTrick.NAME: Card Trick
sumireko:CardTrick.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. If your hand is empty, gain !B! Block.

sumireko:BorderOfReality.NAME: Border of Reality
sumireko:BorderOfReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce this card's Block by 1 for each sumireko:Occult card played this combat. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:InsightSeal.NAME: Insight Seal
sumireko:InsightSeal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sumireko:Seal: Increases the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!.

sumireko:MurderSeal.NAME: Murder Seal
sumireko:MurderSeal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL sumireko:Seal: Lose !SEAL! HP.

sumireko:DeflectionSeal.NAME: Deflection Seal
sumireko:DeflectionSeal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back. NL sumireko:Seal: Gain !SEAL! Block.

sumireko:Dream.NAME: Dream
sumireko:Dream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.

sumireko:MindEye.NAME: Mind's Eye
sumireko:MindEye.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 1 more this turn.
sumireko:MindEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL They cost 1 more this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 1 more this turn.
sumireko:Locked. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL They cost 1 more this turn.

sumireko:Symbolism.NAME: Symbolism
sumireko:Symbolism.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Gain [E] for each active sumireko:Seal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL Gain [E] for each active sumireko:Seal.

sumireko:Precognition.NAME: Precognition
sumireko:Precognition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Make the top card of your draw pile sumireko:Occult.

sumireko:Brainwave.NAME: Brainwave
sumireko:Brainwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Make a random Attack in your hand sumireko:Occult.

sumireko:InstantBarrier.NAME: Instant Barrier
sumireko:InstantBarrier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL sumireko:Locking. NL Gain !B! Block.

Retain. NL sumireko:Locked. NL Gain !B! Block.

sumireko:TelephonePole.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

sumireko:IronGirders.NAME: Iron Girders
sumireko:IronGirders.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 for the combat.

sumireko:MassMash.NAME: Mass Mash
sumireko:MassMash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the total cost of cards in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deals !D! damage.)

sumireko:Materialism.NAME: Materialism
sumireko:Materialism.DESCRIPTION: Discard ALL sumireko:Seals in your hand, then draw twice as many cards. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:Materialism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard ALL sumireko:Seals in your hand, then draw twice as many cards.

sumireko:Banish.NAME: Banish
sumireko:Banish.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Draw cards equal to its cost.
sumireko:Banish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Draw cards equal to its cost plus !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust

sumireko:RepressionSeal.NAME: Repression Seal
sumireko:RepressionSeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL sumireko:Seal: Apply !SEAL! Weak.

sumireko:MentalImaging.NAME: Mental Imaging
sumireko:MentalImaging.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of a card in your hand to your hand. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:CursedSeal.NAME: Cursed Seal
sumireko:CursedSeal.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL sumireko:Seal: Sets the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals to 0.

sumireko:ExplosionSeal.NAME: Explosion Seal
sumireko:ExplosionSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the center sumireko:Seal, it deals twice as much damage.

sumireko:RestrainingSeal.NAME: Restraining Seal
sumireko:RestrainingSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: ALL enemies lose !SEAL! Strength this turn. NL sumireko:Fragile.

sumireko:MirrorSeal.NAME: Mirror Seal
sumireko:MirrorSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal. NL Becomes a sumireko:Fragile copy of the newest active sumireko:Seal while active. NL sumireko:Fragile.
sumireko:MirrorSeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal. NL Becomes a copy of the newest active sumireko:Seal while active.

sumireko:LiberationSeal.NAME: Un-Seal
sumireko:LiberationSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Make !SEAL! random cards in your hand sumireko:Occult. NL sumireko:Fragile.

sumireko:ExtensionSeal.NAME: Extension Seal
sumireko:ExtensionSeal.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL sumireko:Seal: Multiply the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!. NL sumireko:Fragile.
sumireko:ExtensionSeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL sumireko:Seal: Multiply the effects of adjacent sumireko:Seals by !SEAL!.

sumireko:ShockingSeal.NAME: Shocking Seal
sumireko:ShockingSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage to a random enemy seven times. NL sumireko:Fragile.

sumireko:RuleCancel.NAME: Rule Cancel
sumireko:RuleCancel.DESCRIPTION: Make a card in your hand sumireko:Occult for the rest of combat. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:Psychexplosion.NAME: Psychexplosion
sumireko:Psychexplosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal twice as much damage if you cannot play this card.

sumireko:SpiritualStress.NAME: Spiritual Stress
sumireko:SpiritualStress.DESCRIPTION: While in hand, increase this card’s cost by 1 for the combat whenever you play another card. NL Deal damage equal to this card’s cost twice.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deals !D! damage twice.)

sumireko:Telephotography.NAME: Telephotography
sumireko:Telephotography.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack of any color into your hand and make it sumireko:Occult. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:Telephotography.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random Attacks of any color to add into your hand and make it sumireko:Occult. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:Metaphysics.NAME: Metaphysics
sumireko:Metaphysics.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a sumireko:Seal, gain !M! temporary Strength.

sumireko:PerfectParadox.NAME: Perfect Paradox
sumireko:PerfectParadox.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card you should not be able to, gain !M! Block.

sumireko:FundamentalMastery.NAME: Fundamentals
sumireko:FundamentalMastery.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Final cards are played an additional time. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:HonedTalent.NAME: Honed Talent
sumireko:HonedTalent.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a sumireko:Final card, the damage dealt by sumireko:Final Attacks is increased by !M! for the combat.

sumireko:Gravity.NAME: Gravity
sumireko:Gravity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a sumireko:Locked or Unplayable card, draw a card.
sumireko:Gravity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a sumireko:Locked or Unplayable card, draw a card.

sumireko:Fragment.NAME: Fragment
sumireko:Fragment.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Fragment into your hand.
sumireko:Fragment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Fragment+ into your hand.

sumireko:UnlockedSecrets.NAME: Unlocked Secrets
sumireko:UnlockedSecrets.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card you shouldn't be able to, gain [E].

sumireko:Liberator.NAME: 3D-Printed Gun
sumireko:Liberator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a random sumireko:Seal from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:PsychicProwess.NAME: Psychic Prowess
sumireko:PsychicProwess.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effects of sumireko:Seals by !M!.

sumireko:EsotericSecrets.NAME: Esoteric Secrets
sumireko:EsotericSecrets.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! less damage from attacks for each sumireko:Locked or Unplayable card in your hand at the end of your turn.

sumireko:Imprint.NAME: Imprint
sumireko:Imprint.DESCRIPTION: The first active sumireko:Seal is not removed at the end of your turn.

sumireko:MysterySeal.DESCRIPTION: ??? NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

sumireko:LuckyCharm.NAME: Lucky Charm
sumireko:LuckyCharm.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locking. NL Increase this card's Block by 1. NL While in hand, gain !M! Block whenever you play another card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Locked. NL Increase this card's Block by 1. NL While in hand, gain !M! Block whenever you play another card.

sumireko:SelfRestraint.NAME: Self-Restraint
sumireko:SelfRestraint.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Reduce the cost of Attacks in your hand to 0 this turn.
sumireko:SelfRestraint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL Reduce the cost of Attacks in your hand to 0 this turn.

sumireko:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
sumireko:Clairvoyance.DESCRIPTION: Select a card type and draw a card. NL If the drawn card is of the chosen type, gain !B! Block and add a copy of it to your hand.

sumireko:Dowsing.NAME: Dowsing
sumireko:Dowsing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

sumireko:Magnify.NAME: Magnify
sumireko:Magnify.DESCRIPTION: Double the cost of a card in your hand for the combat and Retain it until played. NL Gain Block equal to its cost.
sumireko:Magnify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the cost of a card in your hand for the combat and Retain it until played. NL Gain Block equal to its cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Magnify

sumireko:MalleableFire.NAME: Malleable Fire
sumireko:MalleableFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add a *Molded *Fire that costs X to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:MalleableFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add a *Molded *Fire+ that costs X to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:MoldedFire.NAME: Molded Fire
sumireko:MoldedFire.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Occult. NL Deal !D! damage for each [E] more this costs than your current energy.

sumireko:PocketBattery.NAME: Pocket Battery
sumireko:PocketBattery.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL When played or drawn, gain [E].
sumireko:PocketBattery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When played or drawn, gain [E]. NL Draw a card.

sumireko:Teleportation.NAME: Teleportation
sumireko:Teleportation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your discard pile. NL If you Exhaust at least !M! cards, gain 1 Intangible. NL Otherwise, gain !B! Block.

sumireko:SixthSense.NAME: Sixth Sense
sumireko:SixthSense.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards you shouldn't be able to play.
sumireko:SixthSense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards you shouldn't be able to play.

sumireko:LockCycle.NAME: Lock Cycle
sumireko:LockCycle.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card for each card in your hand at the end of the previous turn.

sumireko:VisionOfMadness.NAME: Vision of Madness
sumireko:VisionOfMadness.DESCRIPTION: Make ALL cards in your hand sumireko:Occult. NL Exhaust the next !M! cards you play.

sumireko:AmplificationSeal.NAME: Amplification Seal
sumireko:AmplificationSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Your attacks deal !SEAL! times as much damage. NL sumireko:Fragile.

sumireko:Forcefield.NAME: Forcefield
sumireko:Forcefield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the effects of sumireko:Seals by !M! this turn.

sumireko:PerfectMemory.NAME: Perfect Memory
sumireko:PerfectMemory.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play on top of your draw pile. NL Gain [E] the next time you draw it. NL sumireko:Final.

sumireko:Possession.NAME: Possession
sumireko:Possession.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Stun the enemy. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:SkillChoice.NAME: Skill
sumireko:SkillChoice.DESCRIPTION: I can say with confidence it must be a Skill.

sumireko:IllusoryDouble.NAME: Illusory Double
sumireko:IllusoryDouble.DESCRIPTION: Create a clone with !M! HP for one turn that will receive enemy attacks. NL Exhaust.
sumireko:IllusoryDouble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a clone with !M! HP for two turns that will receive enemy attacks. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:IllusoryForm.NAME: Illusory Form
sumireko:IllusoryForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, you may Exhaust a card to create a clone with HP equal to its cost that will receive enemy attacks. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:JustAnIllusion.NAME: Just An Illusion
sumireko:JustAnIllusion.DESCRIPTION: Take no damage for !M! turns. NL When this effect wears off, take all damage prevented. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:ReleasingRitual.NAME: Releasing Ritual
sumireko:ReleasingRitual.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have 5 active sumireko:Seals, make a random card in your draw pile sumireko:Occult.

sumireko:HeavyKnowledge.NAME: Heavy Knowledge
sumireko:HeavyKnowledge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 3 or more, add a random sumireko:Seal card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn and has sumireko:Fragile.

sumireko:SealedDeck.NAME: Sealed Deck
sumireko:SealedDeck.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least !M! cards in your hand. NL Draw cards until your hand is full.

sumireko:Vibrant.NAME: Vibrant Something (2 cost)
sumireko:Vibrant.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you played at least !M! cards this turn. NL Gain [E] [E] [E].

sumireko:Rare Occult Card.NAME: Finale
sumireko:Rare Occult Card.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL cards that are not sumireko:Occult. Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted.

sumireko:Occultation.NAME: Occultation
sumireko:Occultation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play X random sumireko:Occult cards from your draw and discard pile . NL Exhaust.
sumireko:Occultation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play X random sumireko:Occult cards from your draw and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:MindBreaker.NAME: Mind Breaker
sumireko:MindBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Enemy deals half as much damage and takes double damage this turn.

sumireko:eeee.NAME: eeee
sumireko:eeee.DESCRIPTION: Discard all but one card from your draw pile. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

sumireko:ooooo.NAME: ooooo
sumireko:ooooo.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Startup: Draw a card.

sumireko:Heartstone.NAME: Heartstone
sumireko:Heartstone.DESCRIPTION: When this card is drawn, increase the cost of cards in your hand by 1. NL Deal 40 damage.

sumireko:MassSeal.NAME: Mass Seal
sumireko:MassSeal.DESCRIPTION: Play additional copies of this card equal to this card's cost. NL sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage.

sumireko:Lodestone.NAME: Lodestone
sumireko:Lodestone.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Gain !B! Block. NL This card is not shuffled into your draw pile.

sumireko:Doppeler.NAME: Effect
sumireko:Doppeler.DESCRIPTION: Replace a card in your hand with a copy of this card. NL Exhaust.

sumireko:NightSeal.NAME: Night Seal
sumireko:NightSeal.DESCRIPTION: sumireko:Seal: Deal !SEAL! damage. NL If you have 3 active *Night *Seals, increase the damage of this card by !SEAL! permanently.

sumireko:Cornerstone.NAME: Cornerstone
sumireko:Cornerstone.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effects of the center sumireko:Seal by !M!.

sumireko:aaaa.NAME: AlternateReality
sumireko:aaaa.DESCRIPTION: Swap your hand and draw pile. NL Extra cards are discarded.

sumireko:Notes.DESCRIPTION: To fill out: Some more stuff that synergizes with seals, perhaps topdeck mechanic a bit. A bit more unplayable/locking. Powers for these.
sumireko:Notes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Glue cards that link some of these mechanics together. I think Final is fleshed out enough. Perhaps some minor synergy in the glue cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Perhaps some more high cost stuff. Block + Damage card. Some Value cards.
Cards I wanna change: Repression Seal kinda BOring. TOO boring. Card Trick - A bit too annoying to use. Keep the card to top thing, but some other upside.
draw a card. Card to top. Card from draw to discard.
arrrrt.....?
Occult cards: particle effects. Glowy purple particles that flow upwards and fade out.
